content.text: I love how my job allows me to be creative and be home to watch my kids grow up
That sounds like the perfect job to me! I love working with people, but I'm not sure I want to be a mother
That's totally fair! I think kids are a lot of work, but they're also a lot of fun. I'm lucky that my kids are so good
I'm glad to hear that! It sounds like you have a great family
Thanks, I do. I'm also really lucky that my job is so flexible. I can work from home when I need to
That's awesome! I wish my job was more flexible. I'm always having to work late
I know what you mean. It can be tough to balance work and family life
It really can. But I'm making it work
Thanks for talking! It's been nice to chat with you
You too! Have a great da
